      • disable

        public void disable()
             throws IOException
        Disable watchdog with "Magic Close". Now watchdog not working. Close watchdog without call disable causes RaspberryPi reboot!
        Specified by:
        disable in interface WDTimer
        Throws:
        IOException

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Close a watchdog (file). If close without disable Raspberry reboot after timeout expired.
        Specified by:
        close in interface WDTimer
        Throws:
        IOException
